department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography:
Rajeev Kumar currently works as the Director of Technology at the City of Chicago's legal department. Here he conducts strategic and operational technology planning and implementations. He is responsible for technical vendor management, budgeting, contracting as well as business process re-engineering. He guides City attorneys on the processes of Electronic Discovery, Investigative computer forensics as well as compliance and security practices.

Rajeev received his Master of Science degree in Business and Information Technology from DePaul University and his Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Mathematics from Northeastern Illinois 
Univeristy
